tags.name: Azure
tags.tooltip: I used, but not limited to, Azure Data Factory and Azure Databricks for data ETL.

tags.name: Kubernetes
tags.tooltip: I hosted multiple apps in a Kubernetes cluster in such a way that high availability can be achieved.

tags.name: recommender system
tags.tooltip: I am responsible for extending an existing model, diagnosing training issues, merging outputs to a data pipeline.

tags.name: self-service data analytics
tags.tooltip: Conduct data analysis/create dashboard without relying on IT for support.

tags.name: beginner-friendly workshops
tags.tooltip: I use analogies which business users should be familiar with to help them understand what self-service analytics is.
